name: Trials of the Bloodmaster
description:
TRIALS OF THE BLOODMASTER

Another challenger rises to face The Bloodmaster? Complete his cryptic trials with a drop of blood left in you and he may finally meet your iron, lest you be cut down by his...

Having chosen to challenge The Bloodmaster, his curse is now upon you! You are slowly dying, bleeding out all over his lair. However through sheer violence you may prevail as the blood of your smashed enemies will rejuvinate you. Along the way you will find various characters and shrines that may provide you enhancements and new abilities. Use them to their greatest potential to survive, and may The Bloodmaster fall under your blade.

CONTROLS

HJKLYUBN // Numpad // WASDQEZC - move, bump attack and so on

1/2/3/4/5 - select ability to use, press again to execute ability on highlighted target

TAB - change target of ability

ESC - stop ability targeting

SPACE - pass turn or interact with stairs, shrine, or others you may meet...

Made in 7 days for 7 Day Roguelike 2023, based on the framework for my previous 7DRL game, Fight City.

Assets from Oryx Design Lab, and opengameart.org
